::Shredder::

Shredder frowns, walking over to a console. How was he supposed to bond with 
a ship? He shakes his head. He was an engeneer, he could figure it out. 
Shredder looks at the console, examing it.

A short while later, Shredder was hoocked up to the comp, ready to be merged 
with the ship.

"Wait," he says, hoping the ship was still responsive, "If I send Bobertron 
and Pantron off, and I kill Cybershark, who'll be left of the Destrons? Me 
and Mantella?"
